name: Aditya Kumar Singh
moreInfo: My research centers on algorithms for Class Incremental and Continual Learning specifically in audio and video processing. I’m particularly focused on tackling challenges such as catastrophic forgetting and scalability. My goal is to enable models to adapt to new classes over time, without the need to retrain from scratch, all while ensuring they maintain strong performance on tasks that they’ve previously learned.

name: Ankur Kumar
moreInfo: My research focuses on creating frameworks to reduce bias and ensure fairness in AI and machine learning systems.

name: Anshuman Dangwal
moreInfo: Currently working in fairness in blackbox models and how we can use them to get unbiased predictions.

name: Satyajeet Shashwat
moreInfo: Training model to forget on a specific data. I am working on unlearning of LLMs.

name: Utkarsh Sharma
moreInfo: Currently, I am investigating fairness in the audio domain, with a focus on ensuring fair model performance across diverse demographic groups by addressing potential biases and disparities in representation and outcomes.

name: Vasu Dhull
moreInfo: Using the concepts of meta learning to Make continual learning more feasible.

name: Rishikesh S
moreInfo: In my research on Generalized Category Discovery (GCD), I focus on identifying both known (old) and unknown (new) categories in unlabeled data using knowledge from labeled data.
